name: comparisonre
short_description: This spreadsheet adds up potential lender costs, but not all lender costs (must be specific for your situation) specific for if you are going to buy, fix and the re sell a home within a short period of time.  Only use this as a cursory tool, but not as your final decision maker.  We are not responsible for any losses you may have as a result of using this spreadsheet.  You must consult with appropriate professionals before making any financial decision.  This does not replace any professional advice and is only a tool.
summary: Spread sheet for real estate uses
